title: Defining Rust Functions in LabEx
description: In this lab, you will learn how to define and call functions in Rust using the fn keyword and the conventional snake case naming convention.

meta.title: Rust Functions | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to define and call functions in Rust, a popular programming language. Explore the basics of functions and their usage in Rust code.
meta.keywords: Rust, Functions, Programming Tutorials, Rust Book, Coding, Development

i18n.title: Определение функций на Rust в LabEx
